name: Prospector Santa and the Moles that go Boom!!
name_original: Prospector Santa and the Moles that go Boom!!
description:
Santa clause is broke. He needs to become an old prospector and find gold. 

Goal:
Try to find all the gold. Hit the ground with groundslams to awake the moles. Some will try to kill you. Others will flee with gold. Catch them and kill them.

Controls:
Move: WASD
Attack forward: Left Mouse Button
GroundSlam: E/Space
